item.title: Sen. Chuck Schumer's book tour postponed for 'security concerns' amid funding debate
item.description: Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer's three planned book tour events scheduled for this week have abruptly been postponed as of Monday morning.

item.title: Private lunar lander Blue Ghost falls silent on the moon after a 2-week mission
item.description: It's lights out for the first private lunar lander to pull off a fully successful moon mission
